activity_json.title: Activity 1
activity_json.text: Refer to the images 8.31 and 8.32 given in page numbers 747 and 749 of Introduction to computer systems textbook. Run the code and observe the differences in the output.

activity_json.title: Activity 2
activity_json.text:
Refer to the section "Reaping child processes" of page number 723 from “Introduction to computer systems” textbook. This will be very helpful for implementing the sigchld_handler function as part of the shell lab.
Look at the following topics from the same section
  1. Determining the numbers of the wait set
  2. Modifying the default behavior
  3. Checking the status of the reaped child
  4. Error conditions

activity_json.title: Activity 3
activity_json.text:
Implement the code for sigchld_handler and check your solution’s output with the reference solution
  1. ./sdriver.pl -t trace06.txt -s ./tshref -a "-p"
    ./sdriver.pl -t trace06.txt -s ./tsh -a "-p"
  2. ./sdriver.pl -t trace07.txt -s ./tshref -a "-p"
    ./sdriver.pl -t trace07.txt -s ./tsh -a "-p"

questionText.text: Write the summary of the group discussion and submit the Google doc link
